# Question 1 

## Introduction 
```{r}
#| message: false
grades <- vroom(here("grades.csv"))
```

## Example 
```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
grades |> summarise(anyNA(Exam))
is.na(c(1, 2, NA, 4, NA))
```

## Question 2 

```{r}
#| echo: false
#| message: false
grades %>%
  summarise(
    Minimum = min(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
    Maximum = max(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
    Median = median(Exam, na.rm = TRUE),
    Mean = mean(Exam, na.rm = TRUE)
  ) %>%
  kable()
```
